creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: mottled and patchy aerial view of a colorful cityscape that is intersected by a river, and is rendered in blue, white, yellow, and pink pigments; white sky; two taller buildings in ULQ; two bridges intersect scene- one in ULQ with an open arching support structure, another in the LLQ, moving into right center with concentric stone arches; clustered, stacked buildings along top edge; faint suggestion of stenciled text in blue and white pigments in URC
medium: Gold Medal flour, watercolor pigment, and Mississippi River water on paper
title: Gold Medal Z MCYK
